definition[0]: the use of movements to express what you want to say without using words, or a play where the actors use only movements
example[0]: The children learn through role-play, dance and mime.
example[1]: They will perform a short mime later.
definition[1]: to describe or express something, using movements not words
example[3]: Stan put a finger to his mouth, miming ‘shush’.
example[4]: Soundlessly, she mimed picking up a phone and speaking into it.
definition[2]: to pretend to play or sing a piece of music, without making any sound
example[5]: Singers on television often mime to pre-recorded tapes.
